text: Gilbert Dying to Die is a 1915 British silent short comedy film directed by Maurice Elvey and starring Fred Groves.Murphy p.179 A drunken man named Gilbert attempts to commit suicide and fails. He then discovers that he has inherited a fortune. Another film portraying the same character Gilbert Gets Tiger-It is was also released the same year. ==Cast== * Fred Groves as Gilbert ==References== ==Bibliography== * Murphy, Robert. Directors in British and Irish Cinema: A Reference Companion. British Film Institute, 2006. ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:British films Category:British comedy films Category:British silent short films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Maurice Elvey Category:1915 comedy films Category:British black-and-white films
title: Gilbert Dying to Die
